response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is worth more than $120 to me, but I understand that its true value may be different to you. To make this opportunity appealing, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that set this product apart. I believe it represents a great value for you and an excellent opportunity to experience something truly special. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 150}
